channel.title: Can some1 tell me how to make people i choose mods?
channel.description:
i need to know cuz im admin and im new of course and i dont knwo how to make some1 a mod? some1 plz tell me
NEW TO BOARD MAKEING BUT HERE IT IS AND IT SUCKY SELF http://bluekiller5.proboards84.com/index.cgi " (\,,,/) (O.o) <-- Copy the bunny into your sig to help him (>_<) acheive world domination /_/\_\"

item.title: Can some1 tell me how to make people i choose mods?
item.dc:creator: @Under0ATH Under0ATH
item.description:
@Under0ATH wrote:

You can go to characters in your source folder and click on the player you want, then where is says player rights or something like that, character rights, I forgot, erase teh 0 and put a 1 for mod, 2 for admin, or 3 for owner [br][size=1]Posted at: November 23, 2006, 11:51:30 PM[/size][hr]I don’t know if that wil work though, I had truble doing it so I switched to Ultimate PK source (I had TestScape)

Read full topic
